class.name: ConfigPoint
class.brief: Config Point easily loads (x, y) points from XmlConfigs
class.doc: This class is a utility class used for quickly loading and aliasing point data in an xml config

constructor.name: ConfigPoint
constructor.brief: Load point data from an XmlConfig
constructor.doc: This class reads in data from an XmlConfig instance. The underlying xml should contain a node at *nodePath* like ``` xml <Point name="danny" x="100" y=":100" /> ```

argument.name: cfg
argument.doc: XmlConfig instance to load data from

argument.name: nodePath
argument.doc: Path to the XmlNode containg point data

argument.name: dX
argument.doc: Default = 0 : default x value if not found in node

argument.name: dY
argument.doc: Default = 0 : default y value if not found in node

argument.name: attrX
argument.doc: Default = ":x" : attribute tag to search for x value

argument.name: attrY
argument.doc: Default = ":x" : attribute tag to search for y value

method.name: toString
method.brief: Outputs the point as a human readable string

return.doc: A string representation of the point data in the format ( x, y )
